short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Origin Requests Only block all requests that isn't from current site domain or sub domain. Preventing spy, tracking and ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension allow requests to current domain or sub-domian and block all others requests.
